bookee.title: Globetown | Bookee
bookee.description: Bookee is a slick, scalable and beautiful solution built using React Native and Node.js. The product has set a new standard in usability for the industry.

africabriefcase.title: Globetown | Africabriefcase
africabriefcase.description: Africa briefcase is a service-orientated responsive web application, built using Node.js, Sails and AngularJS.

chichester-harbour.title: Globetown | Chichester Harbour
chichester-harbour.description: A beautiful and easy to use customer relationship management system, built mobile first and offering a blazingly-fast user experience on both desktop and mobile.
